mapper.select: SELECT id, title, description, start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime, status, created_at AS createdAt, paper_id AS paperId FROM exam ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, title, description, start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime, status, created_at AS createdAt, paper_id AS paperId FROM exam WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam (title, description, start_time, end_time, status, created_at, paper_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{paperId})
mapper.update: UPDATE exam SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, status = #{status}, paper_id = #{paperId} WHERE id = #{id}
